Bash(curl -sL "https://docs.chainlit.io/data-persistence/history" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, re
html = sys.stdin.read\(\)
# Remove HTML tags but keep text
text = re.sub\(r'<script[^>]*>.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<style[^>]*>.*?</style>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<[^>]+>', ' ', text\)
text = re.sub\(r'\\s+', ' ', text\)
print\(text[:8000]\)
" 2>&1)

Bash(for page in "open-source-data-layers" "open-source-data-layers/custom" "open-source-data-layers/overview"; do
  echo "=== $page ==="
  curl -sL "https://docs.chainlit.io/data-persistence/$page" 2>/dev/null | python3 -c "
import sys, re
html = sys.stdin.read\(\)
text = re.sub\(r'<script[^>]*>.*?</script>', '', html, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<style[^>]*>.*?</style>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL\)
text = re.sub\(r'<[^>]+>', ' ', text\)
text = re.sub\(r'\\s+', ' ', text\)
print\(text[:5000]\)
"
  echo ""
done 2>&1)

Bash(cd "D:/Workspace/AgenticAnalytics" && source .venv/Scripts/activate && python -c "
# Find StepDict and how to register data layer
from chainlit.step import StepDict
import inspect
print\('=== StepDict ==='\)
print\(inspect.getsource\(StepDict\)[:1500]\)
print\(\)

# Find PageInfo
from chainlit.types import PageInfo
print\('=== PageInfo ==='\)
print\(inspect.getsource\(PageInfo\)\)
print\(\)

# How to register data layer - check chainlit.data __init__
import chainlit.data as cd
src = inspect.getsource\(cd\)
for line in src.split\('\\n'\):
    l = line.strip\(\)
    if l and \('data_layer' in l.lower\(\) or 'datalayer' in l.lower\(\) or 'def ' in l or 'class ' in l\):
        print\(line\)
" 2>&1)
